# updateName(_:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Updates the name of the service to the specified string.

## Declaration

```swift
func updateName(_ name: String, completionHandler completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func updateName(_ name: String) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The new name. Must not match an existing name in the home.
- **completion**: The block executed after the request is processed.



## Identifying the service

- **name**: The user specified name of the service.
- **uniqueIdentifier**: A unique identifier for the service.
